name: LittleLarriesFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Each day you will hear all of the essential information for St. Lawrence Central Elementary including the day of the cycle, what's for lunch, our weekly Character Education Academy, and any other important news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
